name: Cyber slash
description:
This is a gameproject made by students at The Game Assembly Malmö in collaboration with Östra Grevie Folkhögskola. We are first years students and this is our fourth game project out of eight. 

Programming: 

Semi Asani

Benjamin Ek

Max Hartell

Filip Nygren 

Lars Tallinger

Level design:

Vanessa Grundström

Vincent Karagöz

Mina Mirhosseini

Animation:

Elias Runelid

Lucas Åsaborn

Art: 

Gustav Ryde

Sebastian Schaffer

Martin Åkesson

Music and sound:

Aaron Green 

Marco Bertolani
